sentences.sContent: Placido Domingo sang his serenade of love.
sentences.sCn: 普拉西多·多明戈演唱他的爱情小夜曲。

trans.tranOther: a song sung to someone, especially one that a man performs for the woman he loves while standing below her window at night
if you serenade someone, you sing or play music to them, especially to show them that you love them
